attributes.action: make all businesses in the UK that sell chickens, make them free range
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on channel 4, they have made a program showing how poorly chickens are treated. once you see this program,'Hughs Chicken Run', you only then realise how poorly the cickens are treated, with only 3% seeing the outside world. i have decided to create a petition against this, making all businesses in the UK that sell chickens to the public made free range. those businesses and companys that do not follow this could, for example be fined. the aim of this petition is to make the chickens we eat have a heathier and better life.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
